attributes.action: fund the arts, opera, theatre and ballet much less and in proportion with other activities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is ridiculous that the government funds arts, opera and ballet so highly when they are enjoyed by so few.

Government sponsored activities such as arts, ballet, opera, theatre, culture, museums, public parks and sports facilities etc. should all be funded on an equal basis in proportion to the total number of hours they are enjoyed by the public eg. something like 10 pence per hour per person.

In this way arts, opera, theatre and ballet funding would drop to a much fairer and lower level and activities enjoyed more by the wider public such as public parks and sports facilities would gain in funding.
